# regexcite.rnliang

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of regexcite.rnliang is to calculate the PDF value of any normal distributions anywhere

## Installation

You can install the development version of regexcite.rnliang from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jessie-liang/524-ia-R")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(regexcite.rnliang)
## basic example code
normal_pdf_value(0, 1, 1)
```
